    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Action
    Represents an input action from the player, contains functions to execute and (optionally) undo it.
    It should also store the context of this action (i.e.
    ActionContext
    The context of an Action
    ButtonCollection
    A collection of rendered buttons, that have count, price and other properties
    ButtonCollection.Button
    Represents a button stored in a ButtonCollection
    ButtonCollection.Coordinate
    Represents the coordinates of a rendered button, relative to the first button in a ButtonCollection
    CalcButton
    Represents any button that can appear in the game
    CalculateButton
    A system button that evaluates the expression on screen
    Event
    An event that can be emitted and listened to.
    EventInterrupt
    An exception to be thrown in an event listener to interrupt the execution of the event
    Events
    A class containing only static constants, which are the ids of all base events.
    Formula
    An object that represents a mathematical expression
    Formula.InvalidFormulaException
    Thrown if the formula provided is invalid
    FuncButton
    A button that has functions for all main events
    GameState
    Represents the state of the game at all times.
    GameState.RenderType
    Represents the type of rendering used (in console (not yet implemented) or windowed)
    Main
    Exists solely for the Main.main(String[]) method
    NextRoundButton
    A system button used in the shop
    Operation
    Represents an operation used when parsing and evaluating a mathematical expression
    Properties
    The properties of a button in a ButtonCollection
    RedoButton
    A system button that invokes GameState.redo() when clicked
    ShopRerollButton
    A system button used in the shop
    TextButton
    A simple button that appends text to the screen when clicked
    UndoButton
    A system button that invokes GameState.undo() when clicked
    Utils
    A utility class that should never be instantiated.
